definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 請把砂糖和奶油對半參加。

sentences.english: Yes, thanks. Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 好的，謝謝，請把砂糖和奶油對半加入。

sentences.english: An analysis was carried out on the structure of walking mechanism of semi-walking mobile robot.
sentences.chinese: 對半步行移動機器人行走機構的結構進行了分析。

sentences.english: And. a computer program about the method of elimination is worked out in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 水文對半帶寬消元法擬出電算程序。

sentences.english: Cut salted egg yolks in halves.
